text: My Human Time is the title of a 24 hour long promotional film, created for the now defunct company Audiosnaps. The movie was recorded in a single take during November 2014, making it the longest ad ever recorded in a single take. In the film, an individual appears sitting in front of the camera for the whole duration of the video, only talking to the camera to tell the time every minute ==See also== *List of longest films ==References== ==External links== * Category:Spanish films Category:Advertisements
title: My Human Time
